reviews.review: ну че сказать за нас стариков

Grafica foarte buna si lag stabilit

Counter-Strike is a pretty old game of "shooter", which was developed in 1999, and since 2000, supported by Valve. This game immediately caught on millions of players around the world. The game is a confrontation between terrorists and counter-terrorists, representing the forces of good and evil. Objectives of the opposing sides differ depending on the map, in which the battle.

And here are my thoughts.

This is the most entertaining video game I've ever played since 2007.
I think I've played this game like 2000hrs I guess, played only the cracked version in that day...
I finally I bought this game and it's worth 10 bucks indeed.
I still play CS 1.6 because I had an amazing childhood with it!
By that, i didn't mean online or with bots but I had lots of LAN-party's in my country and my friends still play it though but there's still Lan-party's sometimes in my country ^^
The game is still fun and it never gets boring!
I mean totally this game has lots of game modes which are ZM/ZE/CSDM/GUNGAME/FURIEN/SURF/DEATHRUN/BASEBUILDER and more and more and more...
It's just fantastic! :D

10/10
Would recommend it!

This is my all time favourite game. It is one of the first game I played. This game has been with me until now and I am still playing it with a big joy. It may be old but there is no other game that can replace it in my life.

First of all its my first online game ever. I was very young and i was playing with my friends LAN matches sometimes for fun sometimes with bets the loser treats refreshments. xD This game its the reason that i maked my mum to buy me a PC to playing this game at my home. With the time i learn how to modding on CS 1.6 servers,plugins and more stuffs about PC. After this i learn how to aim on the enemy head, how to fire inside the walls, how to hear someone with his steps and HOW TO FIGHT!!! I have played many FPS(First Person Shooter) Games that they called me hacker of my fast killing.
I had so fyckin good and bad moments on that game that i will not forget never.
For others its only a game for me it was MY LIFE! This wasnt a review but a little story.

SO COUNTER-STRIKE FTW BIATCHES!!
Buenas. Me gusta este juego porque me divierto mucho paso mayor parte jugando cs me distraigo y comprato con mis amigos.
This Is One Of The Best FPS Game`s I Have Ever Played.
Najlepšia hra aku som kedy hral.
Игра детства,играю в нее с 6 лет,жаль что стимовская версия появилась недавно,это самый лучший стратегический шутер всех времен!!!
Легендарная игра, согласен есть проблеммы, на уровне  физика,если это твое хобби и ты хочешь отлично провести время? эта игра для тебя!!!!!!

По статистике миллионы школьников проводят в кс от 5 до 20 часов в день.

Задумайтесь! А ведь это не так уж и плохо.

Благодаря каесу можно не волноватьсь за своего сына то, что он придёт домой пьяный, он тупо просидит весь день дома.

Благодаря каесу я научилсь высоко-классно материться:
-"Чмо ебаное, блядь, сука, шампур в жопу суну, бля, да ты там охуел бля!".

Благодаря каесу вас начнут уважать в школе.

Благодаря каесу вы встретите много новых, интересных людей.

Благодаря каесу вы изучите новые иностранные языки:
-"say pashli nahooy myaso ebanoe!!!!"

Благодаря каесу можно познакомиться с "клёвыми" тёлками.

Благодаря каесу всегда есть чем выебнуться перед друзьями.

Благодаря каесу вы узнаете, кто е*бъал вашу маму:
-"Да твоя шлюха, бля, мне вчера на шашлыках сосала хуй по щиколотку в воде, ублюдок ебаный. Усёк мне блять?" - сказал teammate.

Благодаря каесу вам не придётся тратить время и деньги на спортзал, ведь вашими идеалами будут Маркелов и Лекс, потому что они делают -5.

Спасибо каесу за это.
Counter-Strike делает людей счастливее.

Muchas horas invertidas en este juego, que sin lugar a duda pasara a la historia como uno de los mas jugados shoters online.
No obstante, mirándolo hoy en dia en mi opinión el juego ha quedado "deprecated", en gráficos, jugabilidad... aunque el gran CANCER de este juego son la gran cantidad de chetos que arruinan las partidas. Una verdadera lastima...

CS- это класика.
А класика не умерает.

This is the only PC Game which I play till to date from the time it was released. I am playing this game for past twelve or thirteen years and I am still very much addicted to it. The game play is phenomenal, highly challenging and had a very realistic feeling during then. The recoils are amazing and very realistic. This was the only game of its period to have gun recoil. The whole game playing skills revolved around the ability to control the gun's recoil which was its best feature. 

Great game of all times !!!

Cheers!
great purchase and great experience! and yes, its awesome!
